title: Reprogram FM4000 keypad after battery change
content:
change battery then put back on the wall and make sure tamper is closed

You then have a 2 second window to press 1251, then press the full and part set buttons together twice quickly A green light should stay on

If you make a mistake you must wait 10 seconds to do it again or it will lock you out

The type the customer code followed by the next 2 numbers in sequence on the end (ex:-1234 '56', or 1966 '78'
author: bgunn

title: Add wireless device to a galaxy
content: To add a wireless device, go to the zone you are adding to, press 5 to get to rf options, serial number, B to delete if there is existing, press * then insert battery in device and force tamper, screen will then show signal and device is learnt.
author: bgunn
